html:
1.6.21  10:48 am   When did you start learning music?

      about the same time i learned to speak language, or maybe a little before that

1.6.21  10:28 am   What type of chip flavor is best?

      circus unicycle

1.6.21  10:10 am   Do you want to build a house on mount st.hellen

      not right now

1.6.21  9:16 am   what is your opinion on the geopolitical situation in the Northsouthern sea?

      it all comes down to the water. everyone wants the water

1.6.21  8:38 am   how do you end up writing the lyrics for your songs?

     i have to just imagine something, and of course it is usually musical. in otherwords, it is very rare that i would ever think of a lyric with no melody attached to it

      they seem so random but so carefully considered, i would like to know your thought process for it. thanks!

      most of the thinking is done after. if you think before it's written, the writing usually turns out pretty bad. But if the writing goes well, then it should offer a lot to think about after

1.6.21  8:31 am   Early sciences often defined the elements as being Water, Earth, Fire, and Air. Do you think that modern music can be divided into similar "cardinal" genres?

     sure, but they won't stick

     If so, what do you think these genres are?

      good and bad. fast and slow. loud and quiet. These all seem like fine categories but they are probably all impossible to measure exactly

1.6.21  8:31 am   what's your philosophy in life?

      allow me to demonstrate

1.6.21  8:28 am   Are there secret hidden codes in your answers that we need to look for,

     no, but, there are things in everything that you can look for. Actually, some things are easier to find if you don't look quite as hard, but just look in a more calm and relaxed manner

     or do you just like messing with us?  

     just enough to make the non-mess seem more fresh

     If there are hidden codes, where should we look first?

1.6.21  8:19 am   Are you onto something

      yes

1.6.21  7:37 am   How can I learn the ability of being able to choose?

      i'm not sure

1.6.21  6:27 am   Have you ever tried to eat chairs?

      no

1.6.21  6:20 am   What's your favorite thing about being you?

      the ability to change my mind, up to 1000 times a second

1.6.21  5:51 am   hi bill. what do i do if a piece of an original song pops up in my head and it's NOT the beginning? thnkas

      if you have no idea how to deal with it, save the idea until you do. but here's one trick, just figure out what comes after that part. if you move forward from there, eventually it might come full circle, and somewhere around the circle there may be a beginning

1.6.21  4:00 am   what is your favourite song you have written

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite

1.6.21  3:46 am   how do you feel when you are writing/proposing/editing your (music) videos?

      i feel good when i'm writing it. producing it is a nightmare, because i like the writing so much i'm so afraid to let it not be the best thing in the world when it's produced

1.6.21  3:39 am   How do you know so much, without even saying much?

      i actually say a lot. sometimes it's good to say a lot, but sometimes it's too much

1.6.21  2:21 am   Do you have any wisdom when it comes to sleeping good?

      find an audio book you like and listen to the same one every night

1.6.21  1:39 am   Hi! Does this question box thingie work? If so, I just wanted to tell you that I enjoy your work tremendously, and I really hope you are having a lovely start to the New Year. Hope you are doing well, and know that you have brought a stranger on the internet immense joy (:

      holy smokes, that is quite a friendly avenue you've turned onto

1.6.21  12:07 am   do you think highly of yourself

      let's say i'm..... on the stairs

1.5.21  11:59 pm   I love your bossa nova/ jazz style music. I noticed you have albums on bandcamp but I cannot listen to any of the songs to preview them. Which ones do you recommend for more of that specific style?

      for you i would probably recommend these

1.5.21  10:36 pm   If you don't know what "neon" means, as you mentioned in many answers before: a chemical element that is a gas with no smell or color, and shines red when an electric current goes through it. My question is, do you really don't know what neon is, or do you want to say that this word is used in a wrong context regarding your art style?

      well from your description of neon, i certainly have never used that in my work. except possibly in history of the world when i was listing the elements

1.5.21  9:19 pm   What is your favorite genre of music?

      regular

1.5.21  8:17 pm   Why is it so cold in this church?

      maybe it's on neptune

1.5.21  7:20 pm   What is the meaning of life and why does the universe exist? Chop chop, researchers around the world are waiting for you to answer

      they are obviously not paying attention because i answer that every day and so does everyone

1.5.21  6:13 pm   Hello. I wanted to start learning music, is there any instrument you would recommend? Thank you if you decide to answer this

      your voice is good because you can use words and it's almost directly connected to your brain. a keyboard might be good because it has all the notes spread out in order, and you can play multiple notes at the same time (chords) which your voice can't do. and it's a good way to really learn all the notes. Also keyboards can interface very well with computers, so that is a huge gateway to a lot of possibilities in the modern world. On the other hand, guitars are a very interesting alternative to keyboards. they have a much more readily acoustic quality, although it is not as easy to pick and choose exactly what notes you want to use

1.5.21  5:34 pm   what is your purpose of life or at least  what do you think it isfor you.

      to help develop an understanding of it. I should clarify, i am aware that it changes too much to ever get a complete understanding. that's where the fun and tricks start to come into play. However, i should clarify also, besides the fun and tricks, in case there might be SOME things that actually stay the same, i would like understand those too

1.5.21  4:29 pm   what is the meaning of normal

      anything that's completely ridiculous

1.5.21  3:23 pm   why do people say every social media app is garbage? i find that hard to believe. people say tiktok is garbage, twitter is garbage, reddit is garbage, youtube, etc... but with most of these places you can hide the stuff you don't wanna see. Like, if you only followed one twitter account that posted pictures of plants, and you LOVE plants, then your experience on twitter would be excellent. just venting i guess

      it is considered good etiquette to consider most currently existing things garbage. if it's in the past, then it's called a classic of the golden era

1.5.21  2:19 pm   Do you dream of puppies just like mount St. Helens?

      no

1.5.21  1:08 pm   you are smarter than i realized. i like your songs. they are very good. also, can you explain why the birds are made of trees? because i am pretty sure that you haven't explained this. also, because they are birds, why do they have to fly on an airplane, can't fly by themselves? or maybe its because they are made of trees. maybe that makes them heavier. (please respond to this) (also thanks if you do)

     those lines are from a song. What i can do, is try to explain why they are in the song.
     1. imagine birds' destiny being so intertwined with trees that it becomes impossible to keep track of which one is made of whom
     2. i had NOT explained it before, but i said i had
     3. birds already fly so they shouldn't need planes
     basically, these 3 points might not seem useful, unless you think songs should contain fun and tricks

1.5.21  12:43 pm   Is there actually a meaning in your music?

     yes

      Or is it all just completely random?

     none of it's random. all of it is an attempt to bring you various types of feelings

1.5.21  11:13 am   Will you ever explain why/how birds are made of trees? Because you said you did, but that must have been in an alternate reality or something.

     each bird and tree is every tree and bird

1.5.21  10:07 am   Most of your song espically "might quit" is inspried by your life? or a story

      that song is actually inspired by the verse melody. i just wrote it starting from there, carrying on in a reasonable manner

1.5.21  9:47 am   What are your thoughts on birds?

      they are a close cousin of other birds

1.5.21  8:13 am   Do you hate yourself

      no

1.5.21  7:46 am   What are your favorite chord types?

      normal

1.5.21  7:23 am   1.4.21  9:37 am if learning 3D software is dangerous, what exactly is the danger associated with it?

      imagine this: you suddenly think your life depends on making an entire castle out of grains of salt. think of how your life would start to fall apart if you began to think this

1.5.21  6:34 am   Why do you use Db so often 

      i just make a lot of music. i use all notes about equally, so the more music i make, the more Db there's gonna be

1.5.21  6:14 am   Are you working on any videos currently?

      yes

1.5.21  5:54 am   Would you consider releasing a teaser for "the next thing"? 

      yes

1.5.21  5:16 am   Whats ur new video about

      friends and neighbors,

1.5.21  4:48 am   Are you related to bill nye the science guy?

      yes, he is my parents

1.5.21  3:36 am   Are you a surrealist?

      only in business

1.5.21  2:55 am   you have a song called "this is a song for my next album" yet you said you have no plans to release an album, why

      when i wrote that i probably didn't notice how ineffective albums actually are on me

1.5.21  1:56 am   is there a horde of songs you are working on right now?

      i'm working on the video for one, which is unfortunate because a horde of them is what i should be working on. because there are so many hordes of them yet to be made

1.5.21  1:49 am   how do you walk the line between perfectionism and actually getting stuff done at a reasonable pace

      that's not a line................. that's a huge desert and i've never seen either side

1.5.21  12:20 am   are you one of those people who are born cool,

     almost but not quite

     and if not how did you get to be so cool

     by clutching tenaciously to what 'could be'

1.5.21  12:12 am   was the "gotta go back to the mall, i forgot a couple of things" line at the end of "i can play" entirely ad-libbed?

      it's likely

1.4.21  11:39 pm   why am i at school right now?

      could be to study what a very interesting building it is

1.4.21  11:02 pm   What's your favorite video you made?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite
